bilingual.source: Thee policeman is as tall as the policewoman.
bilingual.target: 这个男警察与那个女警察个子一样高。 。

bilingual.source: A policeman saw what was going on.
bilingual.target: 一名警察看到了发生的事情。

bilingual.source: Why not ask the policeman over there?
bilingual.target: 为什么不问问那边的警察呢？

bilingual.source: The policeman is in front of the hotel.
The policeman will contact the patrol cars.
What might happen between the policeman and the man?
bilingual.target: 警察和那个人之间可能会发生什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry, so is that picture of you and the policeman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，还有你跟警察先生的照片也寄了。

yingyinNormal.en: The policeman had nothing to do with us. We're in the clear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个警察和我们没有任何关系。我们是清白的。

yingyinNormal.en: Lay down your weapon. You are a policeman, I'm a professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: “放下武器”。你们是警察，而我是职业杀手。我是要杀了你朋友的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Mike, he's a policeman. Yeah? Not exactly standard police issue. Really? Oh, my god.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克，他是个警察。是吗？这可不是警察的标准配备，信了吧？我的天。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm the man who's going to kill your friend. Who's Sherlock Holmes? Not a policeman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是要杀了你朋友的人，夏洛克·福尔摩斯是谁？反正不是警察。

yingyinNormal.en: How did you get in? Policeman outside, you mean? Come on, can't you guess? Secret door.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么进来的？你是说我怎么躲过外面守着的警察？拜托，猜不到吗？暗门。

yingyinNormal.en: Check this out. So that's what I'd look like if I worked out. And was being serviced by a policeman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瞧瞧这个。所以如果我有健身，看起来就会是这样，而且还有警察先生为我服务。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yes, absolutely. You know, it's weird, but I had a dream last night that I was stopped by a policeman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没问题，这太奇怪了，我昨晚做了一个梦，梦到我被一个警察拦下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh dear. It is a policeman. Hello, officer. I don't know what I was doing wrong, but I promise I won't do it again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，天哪！是警察。你好，警官。我不知道我刚才做错了什么，但是我保证我不是再犯了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh dear. It is a policeman. Hello, officer. I don't know what I was doing wrong, but I promise I won't do it again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，天哪！是警察。你好，警官。我不知道我刚才做错了什么，但是我保证我不是再犯了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, here. Heisenberg is pulled over by a police officer. And the policeman says, Did you know you were going 85 miles per hour?
yingyinNormal.zh: 来，听好了。有天德国物理学家海森堡开车被警察拦下。警察对他说，你知道你刚才开到了时速137公里吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Obviously, when driving through a residential area or where there's a school, you've got to have speed <highlight>policemen</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显然，当开车经过居民区或有学校的地方时，你必须有速度警察。

examination_example.sentence: The role <highlight>policemen</highlight> play in traffic safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察在交通安全中扮演的角色。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 政策；方针；保单；谨慎行为；权宜之举

examination_example.sentence: The 60-year-old is not an actor, but a <highlight>policeman</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位60岁的老人不是一个演员，而是一名警察。

examination_example.sentence: He is already thinking of becoming a <highlight>policeman</highlight> himself in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他已经在考虑自己将来要当警察了。
